statement: Government increased MSP for wheat for Rabi 2024-25
plain_text: The Government approved an increase in Minimum Support Price for wheat for the 2024-25 Rabi season.

statement: Government launched PM GatiShakti Logistics policy
plain_text: The PM GatiShakti plan was launched to improve logistics and infrastructure efficiency in India.

statement: India is the world’s third-largest startup ecosystem
plain_text: India was reported as the third-largest startup ecosystem globally.

statement: RBI kept repo rate unchanged at 6.5 percent
plain_text: RBI announced that the repo rate remains at 6.5 percent for the current cycle.

statement: Government launched Ayushman Bharat Digital Mission
plain_text: ABDM was launched to digitize health records and create unified health IDs.

statement: Indian railways introduced 15 new Vande Bharat trains
plain_text: The Ministry of Railways added 15 new Vande Bharat Express trains.

statement: New income tax slabs introduced for FY 2024-25
plain_text: The Finance Ministry released updated tax slabs for FY 2024-25.

statement: Government approved construction of 3 new AIIMS
plain_text: The Government approved three new AIIMS institutions across India.
ISRO confirmed work on the Chandrayaan-4 lunar mission.

statement: Digital India initiative expanded to cover 6 crore users
plain_text: Digital India services were expanded across the country.

statement: BharatNet project connected 2 lakh Gram Panchayats
plain_text: BharatNet Phase-II completed connectivity to 2 lakh Gram Panchayats.
000 annual support to farmers
The UDAN scheme connected 50 more regional air routes.
The Government launched a rooftop solar programme for 1 crore households.

statement: Swachh Bharat Mission Phase 2 extended to 2026
plain_text: SBM Phase 2 will continue until 2026.
The National Education Policy 2020 promotes holistic learning.
India raised its defense allocation for the 2024-25 budget.
The NHAI completed construction of 5000 km highways in FY 2023-24.
BBPS now covers all major utility payment categories across India.
The Government sanctioned 100 new nursing colleges.
PLI incentives increased electronics production in India.

statement: India ranked among top 5 global economies
plain_text: India placed among the world's top 5 largest economies.
Drone skilling programmes were introduced for youth.

statement: NITI Aayog released India Innovation Index
plain_text: NITI Aayog published the latest India Innovation Index.
The Universal Immunization Programme continues providing free vaccines.
Railways completed electrification of the broad-gauge network.

statement: Government sanctioned funds for green energy projects
plain_text: The Ministry of Power approved ₹20
NPCI reported that UPI crossed 10 billion transactions in one month.

statement: India signed FTA with EFTA countries
plain_text: India concluded a free trade agreement with EFTA nations.
The National Cybersecurity Strategy was approved.
The PM inaugurated new 5G labs across engineering institutes.
MUDRA scheme has reached ₹20 lakh crore in loans since launch.
GST revenues recorded the highest annual growth.
New incentives were approved for chip manufacturing.
AB-PMJAY coverage exceeded 25 crore citizens.
NISAR Earth observation mission is set for launch.
India launched the National Green Hydrogen Mission.
The Labour Ministry updated minimum wages across sectors.

statement: Food grain production reached record high
plain_text: India achieved record food grain output.
RBI published the Digital Payments Vision 2025 roadmap.
